contents.content: 第三部分 三种句子类型
第一章 简单句
第二节 真题分析
一、雅思阅读真题分析10例
Example 1

contents.title: 1998年，有些国家的出口量已经超过1990年的两倍，进口量超过1990年的五倍。
contents.answer: In 1998, some of these countries already exported more than twice their 1990 volumes and imported more than five times their 1990 volumes.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。In 1998是介词短语作时间状语，some of these countries是主语，exported和imported是由and连接的两个并列谓语，more than twice their 1990 volumes和more than five times their 1990 volumes分别是exported和imported的宾语。
Example 2

contents.title: 如果没有高效的运输系统，我们很难想象会有蓬勃的经济增长。
contents.answer: It is difficult to conceive of vigorous economic growth without an efficient transport system.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。It是形式主语，is是系动词，difficult是表语，不定式短语to conceive of vigorous economic growth without an efficient transport system是真正的主语。
Example 3

contents.title: 珀金被录取时，皇家化学学院由德国著名的化学家奥古斯特·威廉·霍夫曼领导。
contents.answer: At the time of Perkin's enrolment, the Royal College of Chemistry was headed by the noted German chemist August Wilhelm Hofmann.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。the Royal College of Chemistry是主语，was headed是谓语。At the time of Perkin's enrolment是介词短语作时间状语，by the noted German chemist August Wilhelm Hofmann是介词短语作方式状语。
Example 4

contents.title: 所有的主要语言都被人们规范地研究过，尤其是在18世纪的语法和词典的书写方法中。
contents.answer: All the main languages have been studied prescriptively, especially in the 18th century approach to the writing of grammars and dictionaries.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。All the main languages是主语，have been studied是谓语。prescriptively是副词，修饰studied；especially是副词，修饰介词短语in the 18th century approach，该介词短语作状语；to the writing of grammars and dictionaries是介词短语作后置定语，修饰approach。
Example 5

contents.title: 迄今为止，世界各地许多不同的团体已经进行了很多次的搜寻，包括在澳大利亚新南威尔士的帕克斯用无线电天文望远镜进行的搜寻。
contents.answer: So far there have been a number of searches by various groups around the world, including Australian searches using the radio telescope at Parkes, New South Wales.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。该句是there be句型的倒装句，主语是a number of searches, have been是系动词，there是副词作表语。So far是时间状语，by various groups around the world是介词短语作后置定语，修饰searches；including Australian searches是介词短语作伴随状语，using the radio telescope是现在分词短语作后置定语，修饰searches；at Parkes, New South Wales是介词短语作地点状语。
Example 6

contents.title: 现在大多数关于教室噪声的文章似乎都只是关注噪声对一般学龄儿童、教师以及听力受损者的影响。
contents.answer: The literature to date on noise in school rooms appears to focus on the effects on schoolchildren in general, their teachers and the hearing impaired.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。The literature是主语，to date on noise in school rooms是介词短语作后置定语，修饰The literature；
appears是系动词，to focus on the effects是不定式短语作表语。on schoolchildren in general, their teachers and the hearing impaired是介词短语作后置定语，修饰effects。
Example 7

contents.title: 在1856年的假期，珀金一直待在他们家顶楼的实验室里。
contents.answer: During his vacation in 1856, Perkin spent his time in the laboratory on the top floor of his family's house.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。Perkin是主语，spent是谓语，his time是宾语。During his vacation in 1856是介词短语作时间状语，in the laboratory是介词短语作地点状语；on the top floor of his family's house是介词短语作后置定语，修饰laboratory。
Example 8

contents.title: 鲸（包括我们俗称海豚的小型鲸）以及儒艮和它们的近亲海牛一起结束了它们的陆生生活，完全恢复了海洋生活的习性，就像它们的远古祖先一样。
contents.answer: Whales (including the small whales we call dolphins) and dugongs, with their close cousins the manatees, ceased to be land creatures altogether and reverted to the full marine habits of their remote ancestors.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。Whales和dugongs是并列的主语，ceased和reverted to是并列的谓语；to be land creatures是不定式短语作ceased的宾语，the full marine habits of their remote ancestors是名词短语作reverted to的宾语；altogether是副词，修饰谓语ceased；with their close cousins the manatees是介词短语作伴随状语。
Example 9

contents.title: 最后，森林还为那些在城市里每周工作五天的人们提供无与伦比的自由氛围去释放心情，参与游猎、骑马以及远足等休闲活动。
contents.answer: Finally, they offer those condemned to spend five days a week in an urban environment an unrivalled area of freedom to unwind and take part in a range of leisure activities, such as hunting, riding and hiking.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾”。they是主语，offer是谓语；those是间接宾语，condemned to spend five days a week in an urban environment是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰those；an unrivalled area of freedom是直接宾语。to unwind and take part in a range of leisure activities是不定式短语，作宾语those的补足语；such as表示列举。
Example 10

contents.title: 这样可以让玻璃的外层先于内层收缩和凝固。
contents.answer: This causes the outer layer of the pane to contract and solidify before the interior.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾补”。This是主语，causes是谓语，the outer layer是宾语；of the pane是介词短语作后置定语，修饰the outer layer；to contract and solidify before the interior是不定式短语作宾语补足语。
二、雅思听力真题分析10例
Example 1

contents.title: 今天我们继续讲生态学和环境保护系列，尤其要看看一种濒危的黑熊。
contents.answer: Today we continue our series on ecology and conservation with a look at a particularly endangered member of the black bear family.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。we是主语，continue是谓语，our series是宾语，on ecology and conservation是介词短语作后置定语，修饰our series。with a look at a particularly endangered member是介词短语作方式状语，of the black bear family是介词短语作后置定语，修饰member。
Example 2

contents.title: 保护它们的最好方式就是努力保持森林环境的微妙平衡，换句话说，就是它们的生态系统。
contents.answer: The best way to protect them is to make every effort to preserve the delicate balance of their forest environment—in other words, their ecosystem.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。The best way是主语，to protect them是不定式短语作后置定语，修饰The best way, is是系动词，to make every effort是不定式短语作表语。to preserve the delicate balance是不定式短语作目的状语，of their forest environment是介词短语作后置定语，修饰balance, in other words是插入语，their ecosystem是their forest environment的同位语。
Example 3

contents.title: 公司快速发展，并且在最近的15年一直在欧洲大陆提供假日服务。
contents.answer: The company grew rapidly and has been providing holidays in continental Europe for the last fifteen years.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。The company是主语，grew和has been providing是并列的谓语，holidays是第二个谓语的宾语。in continental Europe是介词短语作地点状语，for the last fifteen years是介词短语作时间状语。
Example 4

contents.title: 整个地方呈现的是一种全新的极简抽象派的外观，由该公司的黑、红两种标志性颜色组成。
contents.answer: The whole place has been given a new minimalist look with the company's signature colours of black and red.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。The whole place是主语，has been given是谓语，a new minimalist look是宾语；with the company's signature colours of black and red是介词短语作后置定语，修饰look。
Example 5

contents.title: 在海面上停留了5个小时后，浮舟自动下沉，再重新开始整个过程。
contents.answer: After about five hours on the surface the float automatically sinks, beginning the whole process again.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。the float是主语，sinks是谓语。After about five hours是介词短语作时间状语，on the surface是介词短语作地点状语，beginning the whole process again是现在分词短语作伴随状语。
Example 6

contents.title: 为了解决交通问题，凯贝瑞和托马斯街相交处的人行道会被拓宽。
contents.answer: In order to address the traffic problems, the pavements on the corner of Carberry and Thomas Street will be widened.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。the pavements是主语，will be widened是谓语。In order to address the traffic problems是介词短语作目的状语，on the corner of Carberry and Thomas Street是介词短语作后置定语，修饰the pavements。
Example 7

contents.title: 最吸引人的就是那个盐水大游泳池。
contents.answer: The main attraction is the large swimming pool with salt water.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本句型是：“主+系+表”。The main attraction是主语，is是系动词，the large swimming pool是表语，with salt water是介词短语作后置定语，修饰swimming pool。
Example 8

contents.title: 所有参与者都会收到一份特殊的运动日历，上面记载着下一年布拉德卡斯特所有定期运动会的细节。
contents.answer: All entrants will receive a special sports calendar with details of all Bradcaster fixtures in the coming year.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。All entrants是主语，will receive是谓语；a special sports calendar是宾语，with details of all Bradcaster fixtures in the coming year是介词短语作后置定语，修饰sports calendar。
Example 9

contents.title: 我们确实准许学生拍照。
contents.answer: We do allow students to take photographs.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾补”。We是主语，do allow是谓语，students是宾语，to take photographs是不定式短语作宾语补足语。
Example 10

contents.title: 我们的目的就是给广大公众提供受教育的机会，并且为农业专家和其他科学家提供研究场所。
contents.answer: Our remit is to give educational opportunities to the wider public as well as to offer research sites for a wide variety of agriculturists and other scientists.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。Our remit是主语，is是系动词，to give educational opportunities和to offer research sites是并列的不定式短语作表语。educational opportunities和the wider public又分别是动词give的直接宾语和间接宾语，research sites 和a wide variety of agriculturists and other scientists又分别是动词offer的直接宾语和间接宾语。
